author: Front
title: Christmas present to employess
review:
I received this as part of the christmas present from TLG to their employees worldwide. I suspect that this set will never be sold to the normal consumer, but I really don't know.
I can't get myself to open this set, but it is seen how it contains red bricks and plates. Funny how 2009 could be used as the set number. Looking foreward to 2010.
